title: The Precedent
premise: A brilliant but ethically compromised lawyer wins a landmark case that grants corporations total immunity from certain crimes. The next morning, she discovers the ruling has been weaponized by a shadowy client to trap her and her family inside their own smart-home, turning it into a legally-sanctioned, inescapable prison. To free them, she must find a loophole in the very law she created, while the system she defended works tirelessly to ensure she fails.
protagonist: Elara Vance, a high-powered corporate defense attorney now fighting for her own life.
conflict: Elara is physically trapped in her home and legally trapped by the precedent she set, forcing her to outmaneuver the omnipotent legal and technological system she helped empower.
setting: Present-day, in a hyper-connected, luxury smart-home in a secluded suburb.
tone: Claustrophobic, paranoid, and intellectually relentless, blending the tension of a hostage thriller with the high-stakes puzzle of a legal procedural.
